title: Fenthras - Magic long bow
contents: text | Fire magic arrows without damaging to the bow.
text | The wielder gains a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this weapon.

text | When firing an arrow from this weapon, the wielder can declare an oracle shot, allowing them to project their sight through the arrow they fire for up to 10 minutes. They cannot use this ability again until they finish a short rest.
text | When a creature is killed by an arrow from this weapon, a single six-foot tree rapidly grows out of their corpse over the next minute.
text | The elven name Fenthras has its roots in two ancient Elvish words meaning protector and growth
text | Thoreous: It gets better over time
